properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 6:08AM CST until February 12 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Grand Forks ND
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Little additional
snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph, causing
blowing snow and visibilities less than half a mile. For the Wind
Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low
as 40 below zero.

* WHERE...Mahnomen and South Clearwater Counties.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this
morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 AM this morning to 3
PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite
on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at
dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling
5 1 1 in either state.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
